text:
If a PropertyEditor is defined for a date property in a bean and the bean is
passed a "string" value instead of a number(through a JSP)  ,an
IllegalArgumentException should be thrown.Instead a "null"  is set as the
property value
creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com

text:
When doing the conversion, all objects fell through the class Object comparison
in JspRunTimeLibrary.convert(). Made the comparison more stringent so the
IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
